devModel.name: Waterfall
devModel.description: Simple, but useful approach. One step only after finishing of previous step.

devModel.name: Agile
devModel.description: Not so simple, but more agile approach. Iteration in the form of sprints with several tasks in each and 4 basic types of regular meetings.

devModel.name: V-model
devModel.description: "V" for reliability! Every stage of the development has its own testing procedure.

devModel.name: Spiral
devModel.description: Pretty complicated, but main advantage is the prototype evaluation after every iteration.

food.name: Belgian Waffles
food.description: Two of our famous Belgian Waffles with plenty of real maple syrup

food.name: Strawberry Belgian Waffles
food.description: Light Belgian waffles covered with strawberries and whipped cream

food.name: Berry-Berry Belgian Waffles
food.description: Belgian waffles covered with assorted fresh berries and whipped cream

food.name: French Toast
food.description: Thick slices made from our homemade sourdough bread

food.name: Homestyle Breakfast
food.description: Two eggs, bacon or sausage, toast, and our ever-popular hash browns
